TypecPort1SpdCap.help_text: This setting determines the Type-C Port 1 speed capabilities.

TypecPort2SpdCap.label: Type-C Port 2 Speed Capability
TypecPort2SpdCap.help_text: This setting determines the Type-C Port 2 speed capabilities.

TypecPort3SpdCap.label: Type-C Port 3 Speed Capability
TypecPort3SpdCap.help_text: This setting determines the Type-C Port 3 speed capabilities.

TypecPort4SpdCap.label: Type-C Port 4 Speed Capability
TypecPort4SpdCap.help_text: This setting determines the Type-C Port 4 speed capabilities.

TypecPort1IntSpdSel.value_list: USB3.1 Gen1 LBPM,,USB3.1 Gen2 Skip LBPM
TypecPort1IntSpdSel.label: Type-C Port 1 Initialization Speed Select
TypecPort1IntSpdSel.help_text: This setting determines Type-C Port 1 speed during platform power-up. Note: When configured to USB 3.1 Gen1 the port will also preform carry on LBPM if USB 3.1 is Gen2 enabled.

TypecPort2IntSpdSel.value_list: USB3.1 Gen1 LBPM,,USB3.1 Gen2 Skip LBPM
TypecPort2IntSpdSel.label: Type-C Port 2 Initialization Speed Select
TypecPort2IntSpdSel.help_text: This setting determines Type-C Port 2 speed during platform power-up. Note: When configured to USB 3.1 Gen1 the port will also preform carry on LBPM if USB 3.1 is Gen2 enabled.

TypecPort3IntSpdSel.value_list: USB3.1 Gen1 LBPM,,USB3.1 Gen2 Skip LBPM
TypecPort3IntSpdSel.label: Type-C Port 3 Initialization Speed Select
TypecPort3IntSpdSel.help_text: This setting determines Type-C Port 3 speed during platform power-up. Note: When configured to USB 3.1 Gen1 the port will also preform carry on LBPM if USB 3.1 is Gen2 enabled.

TypecPort4IntSpdSel.value_list: USB3.1 Gen1 LBPM,,USB3.1 Gen2 Skip LBPM
TypecPort4IntSpdSel.label: Type-C Port 4 Initialization Speed Select
TypecPort4IntSpdSel.help_text: This setting determines Type-C Port 4 speed during platform power-up. Note: When configured to USB 3.1 Gen1 the port will also preform carry on LBPM if USB 3.1 is Gen2 enabled.

TypecPort1ConTypeSel.value_list: Type C,,Type A,,Express Card / M.2 S2
TypecPort1ConTypeSel.label: Type-C Port 1 Connector Type Select
TypecPort1ConTypeSel.help_text: This setting configures the physical connector type to be used for Type-C Port 1.

TypecPort2ConTypeSel.value_list: Type C,,Type A,,Express Card / M.2 S2
TypecPort2ConTypeSel.label: Type-C Port 2 Connector Type Select
TypecPort2ConTypeSel.help_text: This setting configures the physical connector type to be used for Type-C Port 2.

TypecPort3ConTypeSel.value_list: Type C,,Type A,,Express Card / M.2 S2
TypecPort3ConTypeSel.label: Type-C Port 3 Connector Type Select
TypecPort3ConTypeSel.help_text: This setting configures the physical connector type to be used for Type-C Port 3.

TypecPort4ConTypeSel.value_list: Type C,,Type A,,Express Card / M.2 S2
TypecPort4ConTypeSel.label: Type-C Port 4 Connector Type Select
TypecPort4ConTypeSel.help_text: This setting configures the physical connector type to be used for Type-C Port 4.

XdciSplitDieConfig.value_list: xDCI Split Die Enabled,,xDCI Split Die Disabled
XdciSplitDieConfig.label: xDCI Split Die Configuration
XdciSplitDieConfig.help_text: This setting determines if xDCI Split die configuration is enabled / disabled on the platform.

TboltUsb4Port2SpdCap.label: Thunderbolt(TM)/USB4(TM) Port 2 Speed Capability
TboltUsb4Port2SpdCap.help_text: This setting should be set to 'Gen2 Only' for Thunderbolt(TM)/USB4(TM) Port 2 if it will only be supporting Gen2 speeds. Note: Gen2 refers to speeds of 10 Gbps USB4(TM) and/or 10.3125 Gbps Thunderbolt(TM) 3 - Compatibility Mode

TboltUsb4Port1SpdCap.label: Thunderbolt(TM)/USB4(TM) Port 1 Speed Capability
TboltUsb4Port1SpdCap.help_text: This setting should be set to 'Gen2 Only' for Thunderbolt(TM)/USB4(TM) Port 1 if it will only be supporting Gen2 speeds. Note: Gen2 refers to speeds of 10 Gbps USB4(TM) and/or 10.3125 Gbps Thunderbolt(TM) 3 - Compatibility Mode

TboltUsb4Port4SpdCap.label: Thunderbolt(TM)/USB4(TM) Port 4 Speed Capability
TboltUsb4Port4SpdCap.help_text: This setting should be set to 'Gen2 Only' for Thunderbolt(TM)/USB4(TM) Port 4 if it will only be supporting Gen2 speeds. Note: Gen2 refers to speeds of 10 Gbps USB4(TM) and/or 10.3125 Gbps Thunderbolt(TM) 3 - Compatibility Mode

TboltUsb4Port3SpdCap.label: Thunderbolt(TM)/USB4(TM) Port 3 Speed Capability
TboltUsb4Port3SpdCap.help_text: This setting should be set to 'Gen2 Only' for Thunderbolt(TM)/USB4(TM) Port 3 if it will only be supporting Gen2 speeds. Note: Gen2 refers to speeds of 10 Gbps USB4(TM) and/or 10.3125 Gbps Thunderbolt(TM) 3 - Compatibility Mode

TboltEnable.label: Thunderbolt(TM)/USB4(TM) Enable
TboltEnable.help_text: This setting determines if the Thunderbolt interface is enabled on the platform.

RetimerPg.label: Re-timer Power Gating Enabled
RetimerPg.help_text: Indicates whether platform Re-timer power gating is enabled.

TypeCPort1Mode.label: Type-C port 1 Enabled
TypeCPort1Mode.help_text: Indicates whether the associated Type-C port is enabled.

USB2PortForTypeCPort1.value_list: USB2 Port 1,,USB2 Port 2,,USB2 Port 3,,USB2 Port 4,,USB2 Port 5,,USB2 Port 6,,USB2 Port 7,,USB2 Port 8,,USB2 Port 9,,USB2 Port 10
USB2PortForTypeCPort1.label: USB2 Port Number associated for Type-C Port 1
USB2PortForTypeCPort1.help_text: USB2 port number for the associated Type-C port

USB3PortForTypeCPort1.label: USB3 Port Number associated for Type-C Port 1
USB3PortForTypeCPort1.help_text: USB3 port number for the associated Type-C port

TypeCPort1RetimerEnabled.label: Type-C Port 1 Re-Timer Present
TypeCPort1RetimerEnabled.help_text: Indicates whether a re-timer is present for the associated Type-C port.

TypeCPort1RetimerConfig.label: Type-C Port 1 Re-timer Configuration Enabled
TypeCPort1RetimerConfig.help_text: Indicates whether the associated re-timer requires configuration. Enabled = configuration done via PMC; Disable = configuration done via PD Controller.

TypeCPort1RetimerSmbusAddr.label: Type-C Port 1 Re-timer SMBus Address
TypeCPort1RetimerSmbusAddr.help_text: SMBus address for the associated re-timer.

TypeCPort1SmbusAddr.label: Type C Port 1 SMBus Address
TypeCPort1SmbusAddr.help_text: SMBus address for the associated type C port

DnxPlatformId.label: Platform ID
DnxPlatformId.help_text: DnX Image attribute. Ignored before FPFs lock. After FPFs lock, DnX will compare this value to the "OEM Platform ID" FPF burned on the platform. If the values will not match, DnX Image will not be accepted by DnX.

BuildEnabled.help_text: Should Intel FIT build a DnX image

SigningKey.label: DnX image private sign key path.
SigningKey.help_text: The path to the private key to use to sign the DnX image. This setting is only configurable when OEM signing is enabled (See PlatformIntegrity/OemPublicKeyHash).

OemPlatformId.label: OEM Platform ID
OemPlatformId.help_text: This setting allows OEMs to configure a Unique Platform ID into the base FPFs. Note: The OEM Platform ID FPF and Platform ID for the DnX Image should match.

UniquePlatformIdSupportedFeature.label: UPID Supported
UniquePlatformIdSupportedFeature.help_text: This setting allows OEM to create their own unique platform identifier. If this setting is enabled, the below OEM ID must be set.

UniquePlatformId.label: OEM ID
UniquePlatformId.help_text: This setting allows OEMs to configure their PCIe Vendor ID Unique ID into the platform FPFs.

InputFile.label: ME Binary File
InputFile.help_text: This loads the Embedded Controller binary that will be merged into the FWUpdate image generated by the Intel(R) FIT tool.

InputFile.label: PMC Binary File
InputFile.help_text: This loads the PMC binary that will be merged into the FWUpdate image.

Enabled.label: OEM KM
Enabled.help_text: This setting Enables / Disables OEM KM in the FWUpdate image.

InputFile.label: OEM Key Manifest Binary File
InputFile.help_text: This loads the OEM Key manifest binary merged into the output image generated by the Intel(R) FIT tool.

Enabled.label: IOM
Enabled.help_text: This setting Enables / Disables IOM in the FWUpdate image.

InputFile.label: IO Manageability Engine Binary File
InputFile.help_text: This loads the IO Manageability Engine binary merged into the output image generated by the Intel(R) FIT tool.

Enabled.label: PHY
Enabled.help_text: This setting Enables / Disables NPHY in the FWUpdate image.

InputFile.label: PHY Binary File
InputFile.help_text: This loads the NPHY binary merged into the output image generated by the Intel(R) FIT tool.

Enabled.label: Thunderbolt(TM)/USB4(TM)
Enabled.help_text: This setting Enables / Disables Thunderbolt(TM) in the FWUpdate image.

InputFile.label: Thunderbolt(TM)/USB4(TM) Binary File
InputFile.help_text: This loads the Thunderbolt(TM) binary merged into the output image generated by the Intel(R) FIT tool.

Enabled.label: ISH
Enabled.help_text: This setting Enables / Disables ISH in the FWUpdate image.

InputFile.label: ISH Binary File
InputFile.help_text: This loads the ISH binary merged into the output image generated by the Intel(R) FIT tool.

Enabled.label: Iunit
Enabled.help_text: This setting Enables / Disables IUNIT in the FWUpdate image.

InputFile.label: IUnit Binary File
InputFile.help_text: This loads the Iuint binary merged into the output image generated by the Intel(R) FIT tool.

InputFile.label: PCH Configuration File
InputFile.help_text: This loads the PCH Configuration binary merged into the output image generated by the Intel(R) FIT tool.

Enabled.label: GBST
Enabled.help_text: This setting Enables / Disables GBST Config in the FWUpdate image.

InputFile.label: GBST File
InputFile.help_text: This loads the GBST Condifuration binary merged into the output image generated by the Intel(R) FIT tool.
